Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION
AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION
REFERRED TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION

Title: Relates to adverse information in credit reports of certain furloughed federal government employees
Summary: Prohibits consumer reporting agencies from reporting adverse information in credit reports of certain furloughed federal government employees.
LawCode: Rel ยง380-v to be ยง380-w, add ยง380-v, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to adverse information in credit reports of certain furloughed federal government employees
